trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Of all the skills you expect to have tested, your knowledge of ceruleum refineries is probably not one of them.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_TODO_00<tab>Head to the specified location and inspect the ceruleum refinery.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_000<tab>Greetings to you. I can tell you ain't from around these parts, which is just dandy.

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_001<tab>You're from across the ocean, am I right? Not too far from the birthplace of ceruleum technology, I'm guessing. Just so happens I got a little job needs taking care of, and you're the prime candidate.

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_003<tab>You see, we got plenty of equipment that either extracts or runs on ceruleum, but most of it was only built a few years ago. Compared to folks around here, I bet someone who grew up around machines like these could spot all kinds of flaws and whatnot. Think you could take a look?
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_004<tab>Out here, keeping the equipment in top condition is a matter of life and death, so there's no need to mince your words on my account!

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>Inspect the ceruleum refinery and search for flaws. Target a specific area and examine it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_005<tab>So? How did the inspection go? Don't go pulling any punches, now!
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_A1_000_001<tab>The derrick pump will probably need repairing in a few years.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_A1_000_002<tab>The valves expelling excess gas are working correctly.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_A1_000_003<tab>You should avoid putting the ceruleum into wooden barrels.

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_006<tab>I hear you...pretty much any of the moving parts are bound to undergo stress and strain. Even if they look fine now, there's still a high chance of breakage in the future.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_007<tab>That's a relief. Considering how difficult they were to build, I'm glad they won't need repairing for a while.

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_008<tab>You're right, the barrels are much too heavy. We use rroneek to transport the refined ceruleum, but the lighter the barrels, the less of a strain it'll be on our animals.
TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_009<tab>Well, in any case, I sure am glad I asked for your help! Now all I got to do is put your advice into action.

TEXT_KINGZE008_05126_KEPAYUWTE_000_010<tab>Hate to admit it, but we still got a lot to learn about maintaining and improving our equipment. Still, thanks to you, we're another step closer to fulfilling our potential. Don't be a stranger, you hear?
